
{{alias}}( c, x )
    Evaluates a polynomial.

    A polynomial in a variable `x` can be expressed as

            n             n - 1                 1             __ n         i
        c  x   +  c      x       +  ...  +  c  x   +  c   =  \         c  x
         n         n - 1                     1         0     /__ i = 0  i

    where `c_n, c_{n-1}, ..., c_0` are constant coefficients.

    Parameters
    ----------
    c: Array<double>
        Polynomial coefficients sorted in ascending degree.

    x: double
        Value at which to evaluate the polynomial.

    Returns
    -------
    out: double
        Evaluated polynomial.

    Examples
    --------
    > var arr = [ 3.0, 2.0, 1.0 ];
    > var v = {{alias}}( arr, 10.0 ) // 3*10^0 + 2*10^1 + 1*10^2
    123.0


{{alias}}.factory( c )
    Generates a function for evaluating a polynomial.

    Parameters
    ----------
    c: Array<double>
        Polynomial coefficients sorted in ascending degree.

    Returns
    -------
    fcn: Function
        Function for evaluating a polynomial.

    Examples
    --------
    > var polyval = {{alias}}.factory( [ 3.0, 2.0, 1.0 ] );
    > var v = polyval( 10.0 ) // => 3*10^0 + 2*10^1 + 1*10^2
    123.0
    > v = polyval( 5.0 ) // => 3*5^0 + 2*5^1 + 1*5^2
    38.0

    See Also
    --------
